price: Kur’an je, zaista, čast i tebi i narodu tvome; pa bit ćete pitani!
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
